title: 4iiii PRECISION 3+ power meter with Apple Find My tracking review: The power of modern tech
content:
The 4iiii Precision 3+ power meter adds value for cyclist of all levels. Power data and the ability to track a lost bike in one unit is a first for the industry.

Read the full article at 4iiii PRECISION 3+ power meter with Apple Find My tracking review: The power of modern tech on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
